name: Hurry for Christmas
description:
Hurry for Christmas! Drive through a variety of Levels and collect the presents santa ordered last-minute! But don't take too much time! Christmas is coming soon enough

Made with the glorious GodotEngine as a Team of Two. with lucak doing the Art

Controlls:

It's a simple car game, use WASD to drive.

W - drive forward || A - Turn Left || B- Turn right || S - Back
